name: memotest-pokemon
description: juego de memoria hecho con pokemones

scripts.build: mkdir dist && xcopy index.html dist /Y && xcopy style.css dist /Y && xcopy /E /I audio dist\audio && xcopy /E /I img dist\img && mkdir dist\vendor && mkdir dist\vendor\bootstrap && xcopy /E /I node_modules\bootstrap\dist dist\vendor\bootstrap && mkdir dist\vendor\bootstrap-icons && xcopy /E /I node_modules\bootstrap-icons\font dist\vendor\bootstrap-icons

author: Iara Pou
